Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Michiganin A (natural AMPs; lantibiotic, type 2, type B, class 1 bacteriocin, Gram-positive bacteria, prokaryotes;  UCSS1b; XXT)
Sequence Information.Source: tomato pathogen, Clavibacter michiganensis subsp. michiganensis

Literature Information.Literature: Chemical modification:   A post-tranlational structure was proposed based on similaity to actagardine: A lanthionine ring between S2 and C7 and two methyllanthionine rings (T10-C18 and T15-C20). T8 is dehydrated into Dhb. This led to C13 free.
Literature Information.Author: Holtsmark I, Mantzilas D, Eijsink VG, Brurberg MB.2006
Literature Information.Title: Purification, characterization, and gene sequence of michiganin A, an actagardine-like lantibiotic produced by the tomato pathogen Clavibacter michiganensis subsp. michiganensis
